channel.title: üè¢ Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Adjust Pearson's $r$ to Measure Arbitrary Monotone Dependence
item.description: Researchers refine Pearson’s correlation coefficient to precisely measure arbitrary monotone dependence, expanding its applicability beyond linear relationships.

item.title: Animal-Bench: Benchmarking Multimodal Video Models for Animal-centric Video Understanding
item.description: Animal-Bench, a new benchmark, comprehensively evaluates multimodal video models for animal-centric video understanding, featuring 13 diverse tasks across 7 animal categories and 819 species.

item.title: FM-Delta: Lossless Compression for Storing Massive Fine-tuned Foundation Models
item.description: FM-Delta: Lossless compression halves cloud storage for massive fine-tuned language models, saving costs without sacrificing accuracy.

item.title: Free-Rider and Conflict Aware Collaboration Formation for Cross-Silo Federated Learning
item.description: FedEgoists: A novel FL collaboration formation strategy mitigating free-riders & conflicts in cross-silo business settings, ensuring optimal coalition formation for improved model performance.

item.title: Localize, Understand, Collaborate: Semantic-Aware Dragging via Intention Reasoner
item.description: LucidDrag: Semantic-aware dragging transforms image editing with an intention reasoner and collaborative guidance, achieving superior accuracy, image fidelity, and semantic diversity.

item.title: LT-Defense: Searching-free Backdoor Defense via Exploiting the Long-tailed Effect
item.description: LT-Defense: a searching-free backdoor defense for language models leveraging the long-tailed effect of poisoned data. It achieves 98% accuracy across 1440 models with less than 1% time cost of existin…

item.title: Lumina-Next : Making Lumina-T2X Stronger and Faster with Next-DiT
item.description: Lumina-Next supercharges image generation: faster, more efficient, and better resolution with new architecture and sampling techniques.

item.title: Physics-Constrained Comprehensive Optical Neural Networks
item.description: Physics-constrained learning significantly boosts optical neural network accuracy by addressing systematic physical errors, achieving state-of-the-art results on image classification tasks.

item.title: Rethinking Decoders for Transformer-based Semantic Segmentation: Compression is All You Need
item.description: DEPICT: A new white-box decoder for Transformer-based semantic segmentation, achieving better performance with fewer parameters by leveraging the principle of compression and connecting Transformer de…

item.title: Rethinking No-reference Image Exposure Assessment from Holism to Pixel: Models, Datasets and Benchmarks
item.description: Revolutionizing image exposure assessment, Pixel-level IEA Network (P-IEANet) achieves state-of-the-art performance with a novel pixel-level approach, a new dataset (IEA40K), and a benchmark of 19 met…

item.title: Rethinking the Power of Timestamps for Robust Time Series Forecasting: A Global-Local Fusion Perspective
item.description: GLAFF: A novel framework that significantly improves time series forecasting robustness by fusing global timestamp information with local observations, achieving 12.5% average performance enhancement.
